iata:shipLetInItemInvoiceLineNumber.description: refers to the above invoice line as the first parent record

iata:shipLetInItemPackageLineID.description: refers to the above package line as the second parent record

iata:shipLetInItemSerialNumber.description: If applicable, individual product serial number for each product of the current line

iata:shipLetInItemQuantity.description: The quantity of items that share the same data within this record

iata:shipLetInItemDestinationCountryName.description: The name of the country of destination of the goods.
